TopicTitle: Really quick: Where can I sign up for the Volunteer Test Subject program?

Articles.Content:
As the title says; I have scoured my profile options, but to no avail.

Thanks for your time,

Sid
Nowhere. You\'re too late for that; sorry. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Dang.

However, I did apply for it when it was available; does that mean my application is still in the pool for consideration?

Thanks,

Sid

That\'s pretty much right, keep an eye out for other chances to join the group when there is room.

Locking this for now.
